        Deprecated. 
        Open the default serial port(0)
        Parameters:
        bps - Serial port baud rate bps must be one of 50, 75, 110, 134, 150, 200, 300, 600, 1200, 1800, 2400, 4800, 9600, 19200, 38400, 57600, 115200

        java.lang.Exception - IllegalArgumentException

      • open

        public void open(int port,
                 int bps)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Open the serial port
        Parameters:
        port - 0: the default serial port 1: cdc serial port
